title: 2025 Jaguar F-Pace SVR Video Review
description: According to Jaguar, it's the last year for the F-Pace SVR. I will miss this growling powerhouse V8 with its refined blend of luxury and comfort.
author: Connie Peters, TTAC Creator
excerpt: According to Jaguar, it's the last year for the F-Pace SVR.I will miss this growling powerhouse V8 with its refined blend of luxury and comfort.The interior is premium in every way -- even the back of the driver and passenger seats is leather covered.I also liked the two-tone leather steering wheel and carbon-fiber accents throughout.There's plenty of technology inside, with a smart infotainment system, hard-touch dual-zone climate control, adaptive cruise control, head-up display and a premium Meridian sound system.
text: According to Jaguar, it's the last year for the F-Pace SVR. I will miss this growling powerhouse V8 with its refined blend of luxury and comfort.The interior is premium in every way -- even the back of the driver and passenger seats is leather covered. I also liked the two-tone leather steering wheel and carbon-fiber accents throughout.There's plenty of technology inside, with a smart infotainment system, hard-touch dual-zone climate control, adaptive cruise control, head-up display and a premium Meridian sound system. Watch my review below and on my channel. Connie Peters is an automotive video creator and journalist covering all types of cars and trucks for the past 10 years in suburban Vancouver. You can watch all of her  videos on her YouTube channel.The TTAC Creators Series tells stories and amplifies creators from all corners of the car world, including culture, dealerships, collections, modified builds and more.
html:
According to Jaguar, it's the last year for the F-Pace SVR. I will miss this growling powerhouse V8 with its refined blend of luxury and comfort.

The interior is premium in every way -- even the back of the driver and passenger seats is leather covered. I also liked the two-tone leather steering wheel and carbon-fiber accents throughout.

There's plenty of technology inside, with a smart infotainment system, hard-touch dual-zone climate control, adaptive cruise control, head-up display and a premium Meridian sound system. Watch my review below and on my channel.

Connie Peters is an automotive video creator and journalist covering all types of cars and trucks for the past 10 years in suburban Vancouver. You can watch all of her  videos on her YouTube channel.

The TTAC Creators Series tells stories and amplifies creators from all corners of the car world, including culture, dealerships, collections, modified builds and more.
